menu_item_6_desc: Veal döner meat with salad and fries or rice

review_0_text: Very very delicious and high-quality meat, I can only recommend it. Service is great, the staff is very friendly, and the seating area is really nice.
review_1_text: Amazing döner place! The meat tastes really fresh and aromatic – by far one of the best döners I've had recently.
review_2_text: This was my first time here and I'm absolutely thrilled! The meat was incredibly tasty, juicy and perfectly seasoned. You can immediately tell the high quality.
review_3_text: Super juicy döner, staff is super friendly and the restaurant is beautifully set up too.
review_4_text: Really good döner! I came from far away. Would love to come back!
review_5_text: Delicious food, top döner! I can only recommend it.
review_6_text: I'm absolutely thrilled with this place! From the moment you walk in, you feel welcome. The staff is incredibly friendly, attentive and warm-hearted. Would recommend to everyone.
review_7_text: Very juicy döner. Tastes really good. Staff is very friendly and flexible.
review_8_text: The legend is back! Simply delicious, homemade – tastes just like 25 years ago. Would recommend to everyone.
review_9_text: I had a döner plate at Sarayli Döner and I'm absolutely thrilled! The meat was super juicy and perfectly seasoned.
review_10_text: Super delicious, super friendly. Congratulations on the grand opening!
review_11_text: I went to the döner shop today to eat. The döner meat was extremely delicious and there was a great selection.
review_12_text: Very nice, great meat, very friendly staff.
review_13_text: Beautiful shop, tastes great, very kind staff – I'm impressed, highly recommended!
review_14_text: This is the best and most delicious döner in the world.
review_15_text: Delicious döner with fresh vegetables. Highly recommended!
review_16_text: Great seating, clean, and the döner tastes amazing!
review_21_text: Very tasty and great seating area.

impressum_responsible_title: Responsible for content pursuant to § 18 (2) MStV
impressum_dispute_body: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR):
impressum_dispute_note: Our email address can be found above in the legal notice. We are neither willing nor obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
impressum_consumer_title: Consumer Dispute Resolution / Universal Arbitration Board
impressum_consumer_body: We are neither willing nor obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
impressum_liability_content_body_1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 (1) DDG and general laws. However, pursuant to §§ 8 to 10 DDG, we are not obliged as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
impressum_liability_content_body_2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general law remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point in time at which we become aware of a specific infringement. Upon becoming aware of such violations, we will remove this content immediately.
impressum_liability_links_body_1: Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot accept any liability for this third-party content. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.
impressum_liability_links_body_2: The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. However, permanent content monitoring of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
impressum_copyright_body_1: The content and works on these pages created by the site operators are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution, and any form of exploitation beyond the scope of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator.
impressum_copyright_body_2: Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is identified as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.

datenschutz_s1_intro: The data controller for data processing on this website within the meaning of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is:
datenschutz_s1_address:
Saraylı Döner
Memet Süs
Horster Str. 372
45968 Gladbeck
datenschutz_s2_body_1: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy.
datenschutz_s2_body_2: The use of our website is generally possible without providing personal data. Where personal data is collected on our pages, this is always done on a voluntary basis as far as possible.
datenschutz_s3_body_1: This website is hosted on a server. The hosting provider automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us. These are:
datenschutz_s3_list_ip: IP address of the accessing device
datenschutz_s3_list_timestamp: Date and time of the server request
datenschutz_s3_body_2: The legal basis for the temporary storage of data and log files is Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR. Our legitimate interest lies in the technically error-free presentation and optimization of our website. Server log files must be recorded for this purpose.
datenschutz_s4_body_1: Our website uses a cookie consent banner to obtain your consent for the storage of certain cookies on your device and to document this in a data protection compliant manner.
datenschutz_s4_body_2: When you visit our website, a cookie named "tracking_consent" is stored in your browser to associate the consents you have given or their revocation. This cookie is technically necessary to store your decision. The legal basis for this is Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR.
datenschutz_s4_body_3: Analytics tracking only takes place if you have given your express consent pursuant to Art. 6 (1) (a) GDPR. You can revoke your consent at any time by deleting the cookies in your browser.
datenschutz_s5_body_1: If you have given your consent via the cookie banner, we collect data on the use of our website for statistical purposes. The following data is collected:
datenschutz_s5_list_utm: UTM parameters (source, medium, campaign, keyword, content)
datenschutz_s5_body_fingerprint: The above technical characteristics are combined into a non-reversible hash value (visitor identifier) to distinguish returning visitors without storing personal data in plain text.
datenschutz_s5_body_2: This data is stored in a self-hosted PostgreSQL database. We do not use any third-party analytics services. The data remains entirely under our control.
datenschutz_s5_body_3: The purpose of the processing is the analysis of traffic sources to improve our marketing efforts. The legal basis for this processing is your consent pursuant to Art. 6 (1) (a) GDPR.
datenschutz_s5_body_4: The collected data is not shared with third parties. The retention period for this statistical data is 12 months.
datenschutz_s6_body: Your personal data will not be disclosed to third parties without your express consent. A transfer of your data to third parties for purposes other than those stated does not take place.
datenschutz_s7_body: This site uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the browser address bar changing from "http://" to "https://" and by the lock icon in your browser bar.
datenschutz_s8_intro: You have the following rights at any time within the framework of the applicable legal provisions:
datenschutz_s8_access_body: You have the right to obtain free information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipients, and the purpose of data processing.
datenschutz_s8_rectification_body: You have the right to rectification of inaccurate or completion of your personal data stored by us.
datenschutz_s8_erasure_body: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data stored by us, unless the processing is necessary for the fulfillment of a legal obligation or for the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims.
datenschutz_s8_restriction_title: Right to Restriction of Processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
datenschutz_s8_restriction_body: You have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data if the accuracy of the data is contested or the processing is unlawful.
datenschutz_s8_portability_body: You have the right to receive data that we process automatically on the basis of your consent or in fulfillment of a contract, in a commonly used, machine-readable format, either to yourself or to a third party.
datenschutz_s8_objection_body: If your personal data is processed on the basis of legitimate interests pursuant to Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR, you have the right to object to the processing of your personal data.
datenschutz_s8_withdrawal_body: You have the right to revoke a consent once given to us at any time. This means that we may no longer continue the data processing that was based on this consent in the future.
datenschutz_s8_complaint_title: Right to Lodge a Complaint with a Supervisory Authority (Art. 77 GDPR)
datenschutz_s8_complaint_body: In the event of data protection violations, the data subject has the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority. The competent supervisory authority is:
datenschutz_s8_complaint_authority:
Landesbeauftragte für Datenschutz und Informationsfreiheit Nordrhein-Westfalen
Kavalleriestr. 2-4
40213 Düsseldorf
datenschutz_s9_title: 9. Currency and Changes to This Privacy Policy
datenschutz_s9_body: This privacy policy is currently valid as of February 2026. Due to the further development of our website or changes in legal requirements, it may become necessary to amend this privacy policy.
checkout_success_message: Thank you for your order. You will receive a confirmation email.
checkout_cancel_message: Your payment was cancelled. Your cart has not been cleared.
checkout_cancel_policy: Orders can be cancelled as long as preparation has not started. After that, cancellation is no longer possible.
order_status_not_found_hint: Please check the order number and try again.
order_status_cancellation_pending: Your cancellation request has been sent. Please wait for confirmation.
order_status_cancel_confirm_message: Would you like to request the cancellation of this order? The team will review your request.
